Articles.Content:
I wanted to share because this is my personal record, over 1700k. I mean, holy sh\*t. it's only my second day play this game aswell :S

Heres what it looks like, i dont remeber what mods/packs i have installed. if someone could help me that would be awesome :3 

> ![vP4WI.png](http://i.imgur.com/vP4WI.png)

> ![Qz5YI.png](http://i.imgur.com/Qz5YI.png)

If demanded i will post the .craft file just for you guys ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

I'll also try to make a rocket with the vanilla parts that does the exact same thing soon. ![%7Boption%7D](%7Boption%7D)

Simplicity wins! Why do so many not realize that! xD

Nice rocket

Oh sorry I forgot to add, try dragging the rocket engine and 4 liquid fuel tank thumbnails on the right side in your stages to stage 04.

So you carry less dead weight ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I'll try that man. results when i get back to you. 

And, you do know you can edit your posts right? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Edit: Dude, you have no idea how many times i had to go back to the drawing board for this one too. I dont like big ass rockets at all >\_>

> 
> And, you do know you can edit your posts right? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

But then he won't rack up his post counts. k;P

> 
> But then he won't rack up his post counts. k;P

Hahaha, ok

single stage to gone hit 1700k in 21 minutes

burnout was at 132km @ T+3m:02s

> 
> Oh sorry I forgot to add, try dragging the rocket engine and 4 liquid fuel tank thumbnails on the right side in your stages to stage 04.

Damn dude, thanks, works like a charm. this trick also help me stage things faster aswell <3 

> 
> single stage to gone hit 1700k in 21 minutes
> burnout was at 132km @ T+3m:02s

You had to go and show me up didnt you? ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

My four stage rocket is at 3340K after 41 minutes.

Hoping my girlfriend doesn't wake up and see me taking notes on the shuttle adventure... ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

> 
> Damn dude, thanks, works like a charm. this trick also help me stage things faster aswell <3 
> 
> You had to go and show me up didnt you? ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Sorry, I literally had it running right before I read your thread.
